Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add job scheduler and daily pipeline orchestration

Implements automated daily pipeline execution at 2 AM UTC using node-cron:
- PipelineOrchestrator runs 6-step pipeline \(scrape → detect → embed → cluster → score → cleanup\)
- CleanupService archives data older than 30 days
- Missed run detection executes immediately on startup if no run today
- Duplicate prevention via in-memory state and database checks
- 2-hour timeout protection and graceful shutdown support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
